languages.text: "Я не люблю бессмысленное насилие. Силу и власть всегда можно применить на что-то более достойное... Ну, почти всегда. К сожалению, иногда насилие бывает совсем не бессмысленным. Но даже тогда я не получаю от него удовольствия".

"I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."
languages.original_text: "Я не люблю бессмысленное насилие. Силу и власть всегда можно применить на что-то более достойное... Ну, почти всегда. К сожалению, иногда насилие бывает совсем не бессмысленным. Но даже тогда я не получаю от него удовольствия".

traits.locale_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « Je ne goûte pas la violence gratuite. On peut toujours utiliser le pouvoir et l'autorité dans un but plus louable... Enfin, presque toujours. Malheureusement, la violence est parfois nécessaire, mais elle ne me procure alors pas plus de plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne goûte pas la violence gratuite. On peut toujours utiliser le pouvoir et l'autorité dans un but plus louable... Enfin, presque toujours. Malheureusement, la violence est parfois nécessaire, mais elle ne me procure alors pas plus de plaisir. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «No disfruto con la violencia sin sentido. El poder y la autoridad siempre se pueden usar para algo mejor... bueno, casi siempre. Por desgracia, a veces la violencia sí tiene su razón de ser, pero ni así me gusta».
languages.original_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."

traits.locale_text: «No disfruto con la violencia sin sentido. El poder y la autoridad siempre se pueden usar para algo mejor... bueno, casi siempre. Por desgracia, a veces la violencia sí tiene su razón de ser, pero ni así me gusta».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “我不喜欢毫无意义的暴力，因为力量与权力本可以用来实现更有价值的目标……呃，大部分时候是这样。遗憾的是，有时候事情只能靠暴力解决，但即便如此，我也并不会感到愉悦。”
languages.original_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."

traits.locale_text: “我不喜欢毫无意义的暴力，因为力量与权力本可以用来实现更有价值的目标……呃，大部分时候是这样。遗憾的是，有时候事情只能靠暴力解决，但即便如此，我也并不会感到愉悦。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「私は無意味な暴力は好まない。権力や権威はいつも、より価値のある目的のために使うことができる…そうでないこともあるがな。残念ながら、暴力に意味がある場合もあるが、その場合でも喜びなどは、ほとんどない」
languages.original_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."

traits.locale_text: 「私は無意味な暴力は好まない。権力や権威はいつも、より価値のある目的のために使うことができる…そうでないこともあるがな。残念ながら、暴力に意味がある場合もあるが、その場合でも喜びなどは、ほとんどない」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Freude an sinnloser Gewalt. Macht und Autorität können immer für einen würdigeren Zweck eingesetzt werden ... Nun ... fast immer. Unglücklicherweise hat Gewalt manchmal eine Daseinsberechtigung, doch selbst dann bereitet sie mir wenig Freude."
languages.original_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Freude an sinnloser Gewalt. Macht und Autorität können immer für einen würdigeren Zweck eingesetzt werden ... Nun ... fast immer. Unglücklicherweise hat Gewalt manchmal eine Daseinsberechtigung, doch selbst dann bereitet sie mir wenig Freude."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Anlamsız şiddetten keyif almıyorum. Güç ve yetki, her zaman daha değerli amaçlar için kullanılabilir... Neredeyse her zaman yani. Maalesef bazen şiddet amaçsız olmuyor ama o zaman bile bana pek keyif vermiyor."
languages.original_text: "I do not enjoy pointless violence. Power and authority can always be used for a more worthy purpose... Well, almost always. Unfortunately, sometimes violence does have a point, but it gives me little pleasure even then."
